scripts.start: cross-env HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=5000 DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" react-scripts start
scripts.start:frontend: cross-env PORT=5000 DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" react-scripts start
scripts.start-win: set PORT=5000 && set DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true && set WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 && set GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false && set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 && react-scripts start
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.dev:full-win: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "npm run start-win" "npm run start:backend"
